title: Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask, LC-dolida Sleeping Headphones for Side Sleepers Sleep Mask with Bluetooth Headphones Ultra-Thin Stereo Speakers Perfect for Sleeping
descriptions:
Introducing the Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask by LC-dolida, the ultimate sleep companion for side sleepers! This innovative 3-in-1 sleep accessory combines the functionality of sleep headphones, a Bluetooth sleep mask, and a sleep eye mask, providing you with the perfect solution for a peaceful night's sleep.

Featuring the latest Bluetooth version 5.2, these sleep headphones offer a wireless range of up to 45 feet, allowing you to freely move around without worrying about tangled wires. The compatibility with most Bluetooth-enabled devices ensures seamless connectivity with your favorite devices.

Experience HD stereo sound with these ultra-thin stereo speakers, delivering high-quality audio that will immerse you in a soothing environment. The battery life of 8-10 hours ensures uninterrupted music playback throughout the night, and with a quick 1-2 hour charging time, you'll be ready for another night of blissful sleep.

The 3D contoured design of the eye mask provides a perfect fit, ensuring zero pressure on your eyes. The adjustable strap allows for a customized fit, making it suitable for side sleepers. Crafted from memory foam and soft fabric, this sleep mask offers cool and comfortable wear, while its breathable and hypoallergenic properties guarantee a restful and irritation-free sleep.

Say goodbye to annoying light disturbances with the perfect light blockage of this sleep mask. It's ideal for those suffering from insomnia, air travel, meditation, yoga, migraine headaches, and dry-eye conditions. 

Not only is this sleep mask a great addition to your sleep routine, but it also makes for an excellent gift idea. Suitable for men, women, teens, boys, girls, moms, and dads, it's the perfect gift for occasions like Christmas, Valentine's Day, Halloween, Easter, birthdays, Mother's Day, Father's Day, and Teachers' Day.

Invest in your sleep and transform your nights with the Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask by LC-dolida. Get yours today and experience the perfect blend of comfort, functionality, and style for a truly restful sleep.
